dict.acceptation: 划分乐句，分乐节（尤指为奏乐或歌唱）；

sent.orig: Subject and phrase make sentences is the most common function of subject and phrase.
sent.trans: 主谓词组成句是主谓词组最常见的功能，但是并不是所有的主谓词组都不需要任何条件就能独立成句。

sent.orig: The speech was translated phrase by phrase into six languages.
sent.trans: 演讲按逐段翻译成六种语言。

sent.orig: That phrase about the marriage- ls that Tess's phrase or yours?
sent.trans: 关于联姻一词你的措辞还是苔丝的？

sent.orig: A word or phrase syntactically subordinate to another word or phrase that it modifies.
sent.trans: 定语是对名词或代词起修饰，限定作用的单词，短语或句子。

sent.orig: The phrase that later became the group title was an actually phrase from the Culture Revolution.
sent.trans: 这后来成了小组名的口号式用语其实是文革中实际出现过的标语。
